Class Button

  • java.lang.Object
    • Sprite
      • Button

  • public class Button
extends Sprite
    A button is a type of sprite that will have some event be executed when it is clicked. An object will be passed to the button, this will be the object the button

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> listeners
      A list of objects that are interested in knowing when we are pressed.
      TextBox text
      The text that will be displayed in this button.

      • Fields inherited from class Sprite

        drawOrder, interactable, name, size, transform

    • Constructor Summary

      Button(SpriteRegistry sr, Transform transform, processing.core.PVector size)
      Constructor for the Button.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addListener(java.lang.Object listener)
      Adds an object to the button's list of listeners.
      void draw(processing.core.PApplet applet) 
      void removeListener(java.lang.Object listener)
      Removes an object from the button's list of listeners.
      void trigger()
      Causes this button to notify all its listeners that it has been pressed.

      • Methods inherited from class Sprite

        getBounds, spriteCollided, update

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Field Detail

      • text

        public TextBox text
        The text that will be displayed in this button.

      • listeners

        private final java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> listeners
        A list of objects that are interested in knowing when we are pressed. Must have the buttonEvent interface.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Button

        public Button(SpriteRegistry sr,
              Transform transform,
              processing.core.PVector size)
        Constructor for the Button.
        Parameters:
        sr - The sprite registry that will handle updating and drawing this.
        transform - The transform that will decide what the position, rotation, and scale of this will be.
        size - The size of the button. From center.

    • Method Detail

      • addListener

        public void addListener(java.lang.Object listener)
        Adds an object to the button's list of listeners.
        Parameters:
        listener - The object that will be notified when this button is pressed. Must implement ButtonEvent.

      • removeListener

        public void removeListener(java.lang.Object listener)
        Removes an object from the button's list of listeners.
        Parameters:
        listener - The object that does not want to be notified any more by this button.

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet applet)
        Overrides:
        draw in class Sprite

      • trigger

        public void trigger()
        Causes this button to notify all its listeners that it has been pressed.
